name: get_shield_information_barrier_segment_members
description:
Lists shield information barrier segment members
based on provided segment IDs.

shield_information_barrier_segment_id.description: The ID of the shield information barrier segment.

marker.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

$ul: **limit**: The limit that was used for these entries.
**next_marker**: The marker for the start of the next page of results.
**context_info**: A free-form object that contains additional context
**help_url**: A URL that links to more information about why this error occurred.
**message**: A short message describing the error.
**request_id**: A unique identifier for this response, which can be used
**status**: The HTTP status of the response.
